greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients of the nonnegative powers of rho(11) = 2*cos(Pi/11) when written in the power basis of the degree 5 number field Q(rho(11)). Coefficients of the third power.
comment: This sequence gives the first differences of A231181.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,4,-3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = b(n) - b(n-1) for n>=0, with b(n) = A231181(n)  (first differences).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 07 2013
